mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pat_master_index( id, inp_no, name, age, name_phonetic, sex, date_of_birth, birth_place, citizenship, nation, id_no, identity, charge_type, unit_in_contract, mailing_address, zip_code, phone_number_home, phone_number_business, next_of_kin, relationship, next_of_kin_addr, next_of_kin_zip_code, next_of_kin_phone, last_visit_date, vip_indicator, create_date, operator, service_agency, business_zip_code, photo, patient_class, degree, race, religion, mother_language, foreign_language, id_type, vip_no, e_name, occupation, next_of_id, next_of_bath, next_of_sex, insur_nh_no, insurance_no, alergy_drugs, native_place, mailing_address_code, healthy_card_no, address_now, create_by, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{inpNo}, #{name}, #{age}, #{namePhonetic}, #{sex}, #{dateOfBirth}, #{birthPlace}, #{citizenship}, #{nation}, #{idNo}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{unitInContract}, #{mailingAddress}, #{zipCode}, #{phoneNumberHome}, #{phoneNumberBusiness}, #{nextOfKin}, #{relationship}, #{nextOfKinAddr}, #{nextOfKinZipCode}, #{nextOfKinPhone}, #{lastVisitDate}, #{vipIndicator}, #{createDate}, #{operator}, #{serviceAgency}, #{businessZipCode}, #{photo}, #{patientClass}, #{degree}, #{race}, #{religion}, #{motherLanguage}, #{foreignLanguage}, #{idType}, #{vipNo}, #{eName}, #{occupation}, #{nextOfId}, #{nextOfBath}, #{nextOfSex}, #{insurNhNo}, #{insuranceNo}, #{alergyDrugs}, #{nativePlace}, #{mailingAddressCode}, #{healthyCardNo}, #{addressNow}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: update pat_master_index SET name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age=#{age}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, phone_number_home = #{phoneNumberHome}, unit_in_contract = #{unitInContract}, mailing_address = #{mailingAddress}, address_now = #{addressNow}, id_no = #{idNo} WHERE id=#{id}

update pat_master_index set healthy_card_no = NULL, sex = #{sex}, date_of_birth = #{dateOfBirth}, citizenship = #{citizenship}, nation = #{nation}, id_no = #{idNo}, birth_place = #{birthPlace}, native_place = #{nativePlace}, mailing_address_code = #{mailingAddressCode}, mailing_address = #{mailingAddress}, zip_code = #{zipCode}, occupation = #{occupation} where id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT pmi.NAME as 'name', pmi.PATIENT_ID as 'patientId', pit.DEPT_TRANSFERED_FROM as 'deptTransferedFrom', pit.DEPT_TRANSFERED_TO as 'deptTransferedTo', dvw.WARD_CODE as 'wardCode' FROM PAT_MASTER_INDEX pmi, DEPT_VS_WARD dvw, PATS_IN_TRANSFERRING pit, DEPT_DICT dd WHERE (dvw.dept_code(+) = dd.dept_code) AND (pmi.PATIENT_ID = pit.PATIENT_ID) AND (pit.DEPT_TRANSFERED_TO = dd.DEPT_CODE) AND ((pit.DEPT_TRANSFERED_FROM IS NULL))

select b.healthy_card_no AS healthyCardNo, a.patient_id AS id, b.inp_no AS inpNo, b.name AS name, b.sex as sex, b.date_of_birth AS dateOfBirth, b.citizenship AS citizenship, b.nation AS nation, b.id_no AS idNo, b.birth_place AS birthPlace, b.native_place AS nativePlace, b.occupation AS occupation, a.identity AS identity , a.charge_type AS chargeType, a.marital_status AS maritalStatus , a.patient_area AS patientArea, a.PATIENT_AREA_ADDRESS AS patientAreaAddress, a.pat_phone AS patPhone, a.pat_zip AS patZip, b.mailing_address_code AS mailingAddressCode, b.mailing_address AS mailingAddress, b.zip_code AS zipCode, a.service_agency AS serviceAgency , a.phone_number_business AS phoneNumberBusiness, a.business_zip_code AS businessZipCode, a.next_of_kin AS nextOfKin, a.relationship AS relationship, a.next_of_kin_addr AS nextOfKinAddr, a.next_of_kin_phone AS nextOfKinPhone from pat_visit a, pat_master_index b where a.patient_id = b.id and a.patient_id = #{patientId}
